 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּחֵל‎</span>] **verb** ==feel loathing== (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhNgAcAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAA2ABwAAAJthI+py+0Po5y02ouz3iAEvnmH94EYaZClWakpyrawG1M0XU9wt5s9oyrhQsFV4/ZzGBNF0QP5c46c0tRruIBKcS4swqsIXj/NMpi3PM7M7HZS7Y63ZSjts3x55/Z8TbEv0QQYKDZ4V2iYqOhQAAA7"> **\*\***Nö<sup>ZAW xvii {1897}, 188</sup> disproves Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, and adopts the view of Gei<sup>Urschrift 270</sup> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בחל‎</span> euphemism for a √ II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בעל‎</span> = ***loathe***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, assumed (Thes Buhl) for [[Jer.3.14|Jer 3:14]]; [[Jer.31.32|Jer 31:32]] see below) (so in lexicons) ***nauseated*** (yet see [[BDB#Gei|Gei]]<sup>Urschrift, 270</sup>); NSyriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhLwAXAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAvABcAAAJkhI+py+3holyhmgqnvjlh+G0apnxgKD5WGZrpe6AonMokDaySrddu9JshOixTj8Ij5lbHjHF3E5KExUlyaaTmOEqGKwsO36zik6U8HrWgYFgaB4/LWcvH3HPuxo7zvOoOGJhSAAA7"> ***envy*** compare Stoddard<sup>Gram. 12, 57</sup>) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּֽחֲלָה‎</span> [[Zech.11.8|Zech 11:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּקְצַר נַפְשִׁי בָּהֶם וְגַם נַפְשָׁם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּ‎</span> ***felt a loathing*** against me. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּחֵל‎</span>] **verb** (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhJAAfAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAkAB8AAAJkhI+py+0Po5Rh2oCxRZXlzX1LBwKZVj5oyjpk26zTq9KKLbt2eOfefvCZgAkhxFhEBkPEZO9Ugc5oUNLpgru2jFVeRBSsisAGn/gMzvaGytoaVlbD2V4VRaxrh6Ux/XMOGMhSAAA7"> ***be avaricious***); only **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחֲלָה מְבֹחֶלֶת‎</span> an inheritance ***gotten by greed*** [[Prov.20.21|Prov 20:21]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]]; &lt; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְבֹהֶלֶת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בהל‎</span>.
